name: skeleton-nodejs-mysql-service
description: Skeleton microservice project for NodeJs with MySQL

scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.test:integration: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --opts test/integration/mocha.opts test/integration/**/*_spec.js || true
scripts.test:unit: export NODE_ENV=test || SET "NODE_ENV=test" && mocha --opts test/unit/mocha.opts test/unit/**/*_spec.js || true

author: PECEGE TI
